      • checkIfAdmin

        public boolean checkIfAdmin(int user_id)
        Method finds out if the passed user is an admin
        Parameters:
        user_id - ID of the user
        Returns:
        "true" if user is an admin, "false" if not

      • removeUser

        public void removeUser(int user_id)
                throws UserDoesntExistException,
                       UserHasUnresolvedFeesOrRentsException
        Method removes user safely
        Parameters:
        user_id - ID for the user
        Throws:
        UserDoesntExistException - if user doesn't exist
        UserHasUnresolvedFeesOrRentsException - if user has any unresolved fees or rents

      • reportForRents

        public List<Rent> reportForRents(int user_id,
                                 int bookStatus)
        Method creates a List report of rents
        Parameters:
        user_id - ID of the user whose rents are collected
        bookStatus - specifies if loans to be collected are returned, current, or all
        Returns:
        List of the rents

      • reportForAllRents

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        List of rents
